title: If You Remember Metal Skates
description: "If You Remember Metal Skates" is an authentic baby boomer story. It offers a nostalgic look at growing up in the fifties and sixties, and surviving the seventies. The author also shares her experiences of parenting, teaching, weight gain, aging, and coping with elderly parents. Although the story is told from the author's perspective, many of her recollections will resonate with baby boomers all across the country.
author: Nancy Williams
